content: Use search LDAP filter to select groups that will be imported. Please note that only users from these groups will be added.

comment.text: This translation key is used for a tooltip that provides guidance on using an LDAP filter to select groups for import. It helps users understand that only members of these groups will be added.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "استخدم تصفية LDAP للبحث" is a somewhat literal translation of "Use search LDAP filter". A more natural and user-friendly phrasing would be "استخدم عامل تصفية LDAP..." or "استخدم فلتر بحث LDAP..."
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: استخدم عامل تصفية LDAP...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of periods after each sentence in Arabic is correct, but consistency in applying this throughout the UI is recommended.
The word 'İdxal' is a bit uncommon in this context. A more common and understandable word would be 'daxil etmək'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Daxil ediləcək qrupları seçmək üçün LDAP axtarış filtrindən istifadə edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'Yalnız bu qruplardakı istifadəçilərin əlavə olunacağını nəzərə alın.' could be more fluid. The phrase 'nəzərə alın' feels slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Yalnız bu qruplardakı istifadəçilər əlavə olunacaqdır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'K výběru skupin, které budou importovány, použijte filtr LDAP pro vyhledávání' is a bit clunky. The phrase 'použijte filtr LDAP pro vyhledávání' (use LDAP filter for searching) doesn't directly correspond to 'Use search LDAP filter'. A more natural translation would emphasize *applying* the filter.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: K výběru skupin pro import použijte vyhledávací filtr LDAP. Upozorňujeme, že budou přidáni pouze uživatelé z těchto skupin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence structure could be improved for better flow and readability. Splitting the information into two sentences would enhance clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Použijte vyhledávací filtr LDAP k výběru skupin, které budou importovány. Upozorňujeme, že budou přidáni pouze uživatelé z těchto skupin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Օգտագործել որոնման LDAP զտիչը" is a literal translation of "Use search LDAP filter". A more natural Armenian phrasing would be something like "Բացի LDAP զտիչով խմբերը ընտրելու համար" (Use an LDAP filter to select groups).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Բացի LDAP զտիչով խմբերը ընտրելու համար

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'զտիչ' (filter) while technically correct, might be too technical for the intended audience. A more accessible term might be preferable depending on the user base.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more accessible term like 'տրամադրիչ' or 'շարքիչ' depending on context and target audience.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Խնդրում ենք նկատի ունենալ, որ կավելացվեն միայն այս խմբերի օգտվողները:" is quite formal. A more conversational tone could be used.  "Խնդրում ենք հաշվի առնել, որ միայն այս խմբերի անդամները կավելացվեն" (Please note that only members of these groups will be added.) is slightly better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Խնդրում ենք հաշվի առնել, որ միայն այս խմբերի անդամները կավելացվեն

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "가져오기할 그룹을 선택하기 위해" is a bit clunky. A more natural Korean phrasing would be '그룹 가져오기를 위해' or '그룹 선택을 위해'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 그룹 선택을 위해 검색 LDAP 필터를 사용하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "해당 그룹의 사용자만 추가된다는 점을 참고하세요" is grammatically correct but sounds somewhat formal and stiff for a tooltip. It can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 해당 그룹의 사용자만 추가됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ໃຊ້ໄດ້ແລ້ວ' is awkwardly placed and doesn't translate to anything meaningful in the English context. It seems like an incomplete thought.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'ໃຊ້ໄດ້ແລ້ວ'. The sentence flows better without it.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the general meaning is conveyed, 'ຕົວປ່ຽນແກ້ໄຂການຄົ້ນຫາ' is a very literal translation of 'search filter'. A more natural Lao equivalent could be explored.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more idiomatic Lao expression for 'search filter' that better fits the context, perhaps something closer to 'ການກັ່ນຕອນການຄົ້ນຫາ' or similar. Further research may be required to find the most appropriate term.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation uses 'pentru importul' which is less idiomatic. It should be 'pentru import'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Folosiți filtru de căutare LDAP pentru a selecta grupuri pentru import.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation uses 'vor fi adăugate', which is grammatically correct but sounds a bit formal and passive. A more natural phrasing would be 'vor fi adăugați' or 'se vor adăuga'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Folosiți filtru de căutare LDAP pentru a selecta grupuri pentru import. Vă rugăm să rețineți că vor fi adăugați numai utilizatorii din aceste grupuri.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පෙරහන' (perahana) is a direct transliteration of 'filter'. While understandable, a more natural Sinhala equivalent might be 'ගවේෂණ පෙරහණය' (gaveshana perahana) or simply 'පෙරහණය' (perahana) depending on the desired level of formality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ගවේෂණ පෙරහණය

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure 'මෙම සමූහවල සිටින පරිශීලකයින් පමණක් එකතු කරනු ලැබේ' (mema samūhavala sitina parīśīlakayin pamaṇak ekathuka karanu labē) can be slightly improved for smoother reading. A more natural phrasing would be 'මෙම සමූහවල සිටින පරිශීලකයින් පමණක් එක් කරනු ලැබේ' (mema samūhavala sitina parīśīlakayin pamaṇak ek karanu labē).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම සමූහවල සිටින පරිශීලකයින් පමණක් එක් කරනු ලැබේ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Please note that' is too formal for the context of a tooltip.  'Upoštevaj' (Consider) doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of emphasizing a restriction. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Pozor' (Attention) or 'Pomembno' (Important).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Uporabi iskalni filter LDAP, da izbereš skupine, ki bodo uvožene. Pozor: dodani bodo samo uporabniki iz teh skupin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The passive voice 'will be added' ('bodo dodani') is less direct than the English. A more active voice may improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Uporabi iskalni filter LDAP, da izbereš skupine, ki bodo uvožene. Pozor: v te skupine bodo dodani samo uporabniki.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ц́е' appears multiple times. This is an incorrect representation of 'će' in Serbian Cyrillic. It appears to be an OCR error or an improper use of the combining character.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace all instances of 'ц́е' with 'ће'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "pretragu da biste izabrali" is somewhat awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "za odabir" or "kako biste odabrali".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Koristite LDAP filter za odabir grupa koje će biti uvezene.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'nhập' (import) in the context of LDAP groups could be confusing. A more accurate translation might be 'đồng bộ hóa' (synchronize) or 'nhập vào hệ thống' (import into the system). 'Nhập' is too generic and could be misinterpreted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sử dụng bộ lọc LDAP tìm kiếm để chọn các nhóm sẽ được đồng bộ hóa. Xin lưu ý rằng chỉ những người dùng từ các nhóm này mới được thêm vào.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence structure could be slightly improved for better flow in Vietnamese. Consider restructuring the sentences for a more natural feel.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sử dụng bộ lọc LDAP để chọn các nhóm sẽ được nhập vào hệ thống. Xin lưu ý rằng chỉ những người dùng từ các nhóm đã chọn mới được thêm.
